name: CrossSide: The Prison
description:
You have been a victim of an inequitable system of justice and corrupt villains. But you are hardly defeated, you’re a tough nut to crack! With your wits and courage, you can avoid the death penalty.

But how to do that? The answer you will find in an old, dirty cell.

Four chapters of incredible adventures, dangerous events, and interesting tasks lie ahead of you. Go through all the trials, get out of the dark, terrible cave to find out what awaits you ahead.

Will it be salvation and a bright future? Or something that you did not expect?
Go and see!
